Title: No Beast So Fierce
Writer: John Logan (created by), Andrew Hinderaker, Krysty Wilson-Cairns
Actors: Reeve Carney, Timothy Dalton, Eva Green, Rory Kinnear
Plot: Vanessa contacts her old friend Ferdinand Lyle for help. Lyle introduces her to Catriona Hartdegen. Lily, Dorian and Justine put their plan in motion. Ethan, Sir Malcolm and Hecate arrive at Talbot's ranch.
